document.full_text: beginning friday morning, players will be allowed to go about their off-season business as the n.f.l. awaits a decision on its stay request to preserve the lockout.
document.title: for now, n.f.l. players can return to work
lines_and_colors: beginning friday morning, players will be allowed to go about their off-season business as the n.f.l. awaits a decision on its stay request to preserve the lockout.
